mapper.select: SELECT A.iproduct, A.product_nm, A.price, A.rc_fl, A.pop_fl, A.new_fl, A.rep_pic, COUNT(DISTINCT R.iorder) AS reviewCnt, IF(COUNT(L.iuser) > 0, 1, 0) AS likeProduct FROM t_product A LEFT JOIN t_review R ON A.iproduct = R.iproduct LEFT JOIN t_wish_list L ON A.iproduct = L.iproduct WHERE A.rc_fl = 1 GROUP BY A.iproduct

SELECT A.iproduct, A.product_nm, A.price, A.rc_fl, A.pop_fl, A.new_fl, A.rep_pic, COUNT(DISTINCT R.iorder) AS reviewCnt, IF(COUNT(L.iuser) > 0, 1, 0) AS likeProduct FROM t_product A LEFT JOIN t_review R ON A.iproduct = R.iproduct LEFT JOIN t_wish_list L ON A.iproduct = L.iproduct WHERE A.new_fl = 1 GROUP BY A.iproduct

SELECT A.iproduct, A.product_nm, A.price, A.rc_fl, A.pop_fl, A.new_fl, A.rep_pic, COUNT(DISTINCT R.iorder) AS reviewCnt, IF(COUNT(L.iuser) > 0, 1, 0) AS likeProduct FROM t_product A LEFT JOIN t_review R ON A.iproduct = R.iproduct LEFT JOIN t_wish_list L ON A.iproduct = L.iproduct WHERE A.pop_fl = 1 GROUP BY A.iproduct

SELECT A.iproduct, A.product_nm, A.price, A.rc_fl, A.pop_fl, A.new_fl, A.rep_pic, COUNT(DISTINCT R.iorder) AS reviewCnt, IF(COUNT(L.iuser) > 0, 1, 0) AS likeProduct FROM t_product A LEFT JOIN t_review R ON A.iproduct = R.iproduct LEFT JOIN t_wish_list L ON A.iproduct = L.iproduct LEFT JOIN t_user_child UC ON A.recommand_age = UC.ichild_age WHERE A.recommand_age = #{recommandAge} GROUP BY A.iproduct

SELECT A.iproduct, A.product_nm, A.rep_pic, A.price, B.product_cnt, A.price * B.product_cnt AS totalPrice, (SELECT SUM(B.product_cnt * A.price) FROM t_product A JOIN t_basket B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct )AS paymentAmount FROM t_product A JOIN t_basket B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct JOIN t_user C ON C.iuser = B.iuser WHERE B.iuser = #{iuser}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_basket SET product_cnt = #{productCnt}, price = (SELECT price FROM t_product WHERE iproduct = #{iproduct}) * #{productCnt} WHERE iuser = #{iuser} AND iproduct = #{iproduct}
mapper.select: SELECT A.product_nm, A.iproduct, A.rep_pic, A.price, A.product_details, if(B.iuser IS NULL, 0, 1) AS likeProduct FROM t_product A LEFT JOIN t_wish_list B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct AND B.iuser = #{iuser} WHERE A.iproduct = #{iproduct}
SELECT COUNT(ireview) AS reviewCnt , AVG(product_score) AS avgProductScore FROM t_review WHERE iproduct = #{iproduct}
